reference.shortdesc: The codeblock element identifies lines of program code.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: Processors SHOULD preserve line the breaks and spaces that are present in the content of a codeblock element.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The codeblock is specialized from pre. It is defined in the programming domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , , and .

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the codeblock element contains an excerpt from the code for a program:
example.codeblock: <codeblock> /* a long sample program */ Do forever Say "Hello, World" End </codeblock>
